item.title: ECTHRwatch submission
item.description: Before I publish more, I first need to redact more information from what was submitted to the European Court of Human Rights since the Court’s records pertaining to this case, V.L.C. v. France (50552/22) have been sealed. (1) General Introduction (2) Dear Honorable Judges of the European Court of Human Rights, (3) I request the permission to file my application, including the request for interim measures and any subsequent legal proceedings, in the English language. This request is predicated on specific considerations pertinent to the case at hand.

item.title: Request for anonymity - European Court of Human Rights - McDonald’s RICO case
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original document: request_for_anonymity_2022-11-01_Redacted.pdf This request for anonymity was submitted to the European Court of Human Rights by fax to +33 390214350 on October 31, 2022, at 17:06:23 (GMT), or November 01, 2022, at 01:06 (am) Beijing time. My request for anonymity was approved by the European Court of Human Rights on November 02, 2022. However, I didn’t receive the notification by email they claim to have sent me on that day.
